div.p: In T&P Refrigeration we are a wholesale commercial company with more than 20 years of experience, with its operations center in Hermosillo, Sonora, Mexico. We have six points of sale located in the Northwest of Mexico, in the States of Sonora, Sinaloa and Baja California and also in the Operations and Distribution Center located in the city of Hermosillo, Sonora.

We are dedicated to the commercialization of spare parts, installation materials and equipment for air conditioning, refrigeration and air ventilation, being our primary objective to serve the contractors of these branches, both in the Northwest of Mexico through our establishments and through of our new store option by phone and internet to serve the rest of the country.

We are distributors of important manufacturers of the products we sell, both in Mexico and the United States, which allows us to provide a wide range of alternatives for market needs, technical support, guarantees and trained personnel to support investments of those who use our services.

As of 2006, we are active members of HARDI, an organization that groups more than 450 distribution companies and more than 300 associated manufacturing companies, mainly in the United States, and that represent little more than 80% of the value of products sold through distribution companies. .

T&P Refrigeracion is a regional company specialized in the attention to contractor companies, which operates in the Northwest of the Mexican Republic. Established more than 20 years ago, it has as its base of operations the city of Hermosillo, Sonora, Mexico, and is dedicated to the commercialization of equipment, installation materials and refurbishments for Air Conditioning, Refrigeration and Ventilation.
To effectively satisfy the supply of products and services to our customers, generating mutual business opportunities, backed by our values, innovation and development of our collaborators.

To be a leading company in the marketing of air conditioning and refrigeration products in the northwest and with presence in other territories of the Mexican Republic operating as an intelligent company.

div.h5: WE SUPPORT THE SUCCESS OF YOUR BUSINESS

p.p: There is no minimum purchase limit. Any number of products, regardless of their price will be attended.
Purchase orders will be invoiced at current prices on the date of shipment. All prices are subject to change without notice as long as they are not billed.

Purchase orders will be filled upon receipt of the total payment of the products or it is suggested to make the payments preferably using the electronic banking system, for the agile and secure of this type of transactions.

Available to customers with an authorized and current line of credit. Credit sales invoices will cause interest if they are not paid when due. Purchase orders from customers with suspended credit will not be processed.

Any return of products arising from causes attributable to the buyer, will generate a charge of 20% on the value of your shipment, will be freight paid by the customer to the branch that corresponds. If the products are returned for reasons attributable to T&P Refrigeraci√≥n or to the manufacturers of the product, the money will be returned or a credit will be extended to the customer's account after receiving and having accepted the return.

All prices are L.A.B. point of sale or assortment of T&P Refrigeration. The freight charges for shipping products are charged to the customer, who will pay them when they are received. In case of receiving damaged or missing products, the customer must immediately claim the freight company.
All our products are guaranteed, however, the terms vary according to the policies and conditions established by each supplier or manufacturer. The electrical parts have no guarantee.
